entry.title: 🕉️(Only 100 left) | Sawan Special: Shuddhi Shakti Combo – Triveni Sangam Gangajal + Mahakal Energized Trishul
entry.summary:
Vendor: VAMA Mall
Type:
Price: 999.00

Experience the divine force of triple-blessed water from Triveni Sangam and a temple-energized Mahakal Trishul from Juna Mahakal Mandir, Ujjain – exclusively brought together in this sacred Sawan Special Combo.

Whether you're performing Shiv Abhishek, seeking home protection, or gifting sacred energy to a loved one, this combo is a symbol of power, purity, and protection.

🔱 What’s Inside

  • 1 Bottle (Triveni Gangajal) – Sourced from the sacred confluence of Ganga, Yamuna & Saraswati

  • 1 Mahakal Trishul Idol – Energized at Juna Mahakal Mandir, infused with divine vibrations

🌿 Benefits

  • 🚪 Protect Your Space – Shields your home from negative energy

  • 🧘 Purify Your Soul – Ideal for daily pooja, abhishek, and spiritual rituals

  • 🙏 Please Your Mahadev – A powerful Sawan offering for Lord Shiva devotees

🛕 Perfect For

  • Shiv Abhishek & Daily Pooja

  • Home & Office Vastu Protection

  • Gifting to Spiritual Seekers

  • Sawan Rituals & Festive Offerings

📦 Product Details

  • Water Type: Triveni Sangam Gangajal (triple sacred rivers)

  • Trishul Material: Golden-finish metal idol

  • Shelf Life: Best used within 12 months of collection

  • Packaging: Secure, tamper-proof bottle + padded idol box

entry.title: (Launch Offer): Saat Mukhi Rudraksha – Energized at 7 Powerful Shiva Temples | 49x Energy | For Financial Stability & Growth
entry.summary:
Vendor: VAMA Mall
Type:
Price: 2100.00

Saat Mukhi Rudraksha – Certified and energized through rituals at 7 sacred Shiva temples. It helps in attracting wealth, bringing stability, and reducing the effects of Shani (Saturn). It helps to open all paths to financial growth.

Unlock Divine Power with Saat Mukhi Rudraksha - This rare 7 Mukhi Rudraksha is energized with powerful rituals and mantras at 7 sacred Jyotirlinga temples. Each temple adds its own spiritual energy—giving you 49x divine blessings in one sacred bead.

It’s a powerful tool for wealth, protection, and inner strength. It helps to seek spiritual growth and financial stability with Lord Shiva’s blessings.

Key Benefits of Wearing This Energized Rudraksha:

 • Attracts wealth and removes money blocks

 • Boosts inner strength and confidence

 • Brings success in job, business & personal life

 • Protects from negative energy & help in emotional and mental healing

How to Wear:

• You can wear this Rudraksha on any day of the week
• Cleanse with Ganga Jal or raw milk and chant “Om Hoom Namah” 108 times
• Wear on your neck or right wrist with full faith

Type:

Natural Red Garnet Bracelet

Energized (Siddh Kiya Hua) Bracelet |08mm, 18-19 Beads | 1 Item

“Ignite Your Inner Strength: The Power of Red Garnet for Courage and Balance”

The Natural Red Garnet Bracelet is a symbol of strength, vitality, and protection. Crafted with authentic Red Garnet gemstones, this bracelet channels the fiery energy of Mars to inspire courage and determination, promoting fearlessness and emotional balance.


Benefits:

1. Neutralizes planetary imbalances by strengthening Mars’ positive influence.

2. Enhances strength and stamina, empowering you to overcome challenges.

3. Encourages courage, reducing fear and fostering resilience.

4. Attracts success and prosperity, creating opportunities for growth.

5. Offers protection, relieving stress and promoting emotional well-being.

6. Healing properties that alleviate anxiety, improving overall health.
